LanguageData.VAE_HulkBloodlust: A hunting Insectoid Hulk has entered a state of bloodlust nearby. Be careful!
LanguageData.VAE_LetterInsectoidHulk: A rampaging Insectoid Hulk is nearby!\n\nAccompanied by hostile insectoids, this creature has the ability to knock down walls and doors if it comes close to them. It will try to assault your colony and engage your colonists in a very dangerous close quarters combat.
LanguageData.VAE_OpenCocoonDesc: Open cocoon to free a trapped colonist or animal
LanguageData.VAE_Scheduled: This cocoon has been scheduled to be opened by a colonist
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonHurt: The occupant of this coccoon is hurt, open the cocoon fast to prevent further damage!
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonCritical: The occupant of this cocoon is critically injured, open the cocoon fast to prevent further damage!
LanguageData.VAE_CocoonDeath: The occupant of this cocoon is dead
LanguageData.VAE_AnimalSpawnMultiplierTooltip: This multiplier will affect the spawn changes (commonalities) of ALL animals in this mod. For example, if set to 0.5 animals from the mod will spawn half as much as default (which is 1). If set to 2, you'll get twice as many as default, and so on. This only affects wild spawns.
LanguageData.VAE_ArachnophobiaMode: Arachnophobia mode: remove legs from spiders' graphics
LanguageData.VAE_InsectoidHulkDisabled: Disable "The Beastliest of Beasts" incident (Insectoid Hulk assault)
